scheduler.name: scx_rlfifo
scheduler.description: A simple Round-Robin scheduler running in user-space based on scx_rustland_core framework. Dequeues tasks in FIFO order and assigns dynamic time slices to achieve basic Round-Robin behavior. Provided as a template for testing more complex scheduling policies.
scheduler.characteristics: user space scheduling, fifo ordering, dynamic time slices, rustland core based, simple template
scheduler.limitations: Not production ready, use kernel SCHED_FIFO for real-time needs
